website_summaries.verdict: The best general dock line with a good amount of length for a variety of watercraft sizes.
pros: Double-braided construction offers a lot of durability and longevity for repeated use
Line is thin enough to work with and tie quickly while securing the watercraft to the dock
cons: Lines may be too thin for larger watercraft or for heavier uses/bad weather conditions

customer_reviews.title: Picture Shown in DESCRIPTION is NOT what they are SELLING
customer_reviews.text: BUYER Beware! Product in PICTURE (see attached) is not what is being sold. SHORELINE MARINE PRODUCTS come in a box and the ends of the rope are BRAIDED to seal, as shown in the picture. I have purchased SHORELINE Products before. What arrived was more or less ropes from hardware store cut inaccurately to length and transparent Scotch tape wrapped around the ends (NO BRAIDING). The rope was already "fraying" not only at the ends but other areas of the rope as well. AGAIN, what is pictured is not what they are selling. SEE PICTURES
customer_reviews.author: W. Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value. Well Finished Ends
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lines to add to a boat I recently bought. One of the reviews that I read indicated that the ends were not braided at the end to prevent unraveling. I purchased anyway. To my pleasant surprise the ends were beautifully finished and after a month of use they are a solid as new. I'm shocked these ropes are sold for this price. They have an excellent feel in the hand, the dock end loop is well manufactured. The rope is supple, holds knots excellently and appears durable in the month or so of my use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W.

customer_reviews.title: Quality made, very durable, good price.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second rope. I have not needed to use it. My first Shoreline rope is 2 years old and in great shape after more than 100 fishing trips! This is a excellent quality rope. The price was reasonable also.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy mooring line
customer_reviews.text: I put this line on my boat for mooring. Im glad i Got the 20 ft length, the 15 would be to short for my 21 ft aluminum sport fishing boat. Very sturdy nice loop on the end. I liked it and bought another for thr stern.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Good quality ropes without the high price!
customer_reviews.text: Love these.ripws just didn't want to pay the box store price. Got a great deal on amazon for these. They are higher quality ropes not the cheap stuff you find on the docks at marinas. They are soft to the touch but at the same time resistant to fraying. I would definitely recommend dt his product to any boater. Good lines last a long time. Spend the extra few bucks and keep the ice accessories to show off the boat.
customer_reviews.author: j brad g

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great dock line. Has good length, appears durable and will work just fine. A lot better than my previous dock line. I like the loop on the end which my other rope didn’t have. I don’t have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M

customer_reviews.title: Happy w smaller thickness.
customer_reviews.text: Wasnt sure which rope thickness to buy. I went with thinner style and I am glad I did. Fits cleats nicely with room for bumper rope. Still sturdy and ideal rope. Long. Bright color. Finished ends.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality!
customer_reviews.text: This rope was everything I had hoped for. Heavy duty yet supple and coils easily. I bought 2 for fore and aft tie-up at the dock. If you need a high quality rope at a great price - BUY THIS ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Heinen

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These have worked great with our wake surfing boat. Great value for the money, and much better and cheaper than my local marine store. I'm buying more...
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Lance

customer_reviews.title: Solid rope
customer_reviews.text: I was planning on opening this up and getting some thin line, but this is a nice thick rope. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just like the ones from West Marine but a lot less $$$$.
customer_reviews.author: Royden Daikawa

customer_reviews.title: The loop end is as shown and looks pretty solid. The ends of the lines are not ...
customer_reviews.text: The loop end is as shown and looks pretty solid. The ends of the lines are not whipped as shown in the picture. Melted and clear heat shrink around the free end. Looks like it will hold but may have to bust out a needle and twine to whip it more securely down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great load lashing rope.
customer_reviews.text: I use them for tying loads down on my trailers. Real handy with a loop already on one end. Got the blue because they were the cheapest, but it a lot easier to see and find.
customer_reviews.author: Bob I

customer_reviews.title: Solid Control
customer_reviews.text: Nice and solid; easier to manage than hollow polypropylene or other limp nylon ropes I have used.
customer_reviews.author: T22

customer_reviews.title: Good quality rope
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked shoreline products. Good quality. A little pricier than i would have liked but seem to be holding up well to the elements. Wish they made these in 5’ and 10’ lengths as my boat is a tight fit in the slip and cleats are close and 15’ is way to much rope for what i need.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Nice dock ropes, built well, strong and right length. These will last me a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: The rope does what it should
customer_reviews.text: The rope does what it should, but you can buy it Wal-Mart for the price and get it instantly
customer_reviews.author: james compton

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: Nice ropes. Good color and feel. The length is handy too
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great tie up line
customer_reviews.text: Love this rope on my new boat. It's a rope, it's blue, and its heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Really nice rope, as far as rope goes
customer_reviews.text: This rope holds my pontoon boat in place, at the dock, and looks good while doing it. Nicely done, Rope!!
customer_reviews.author: neuropsych

customer_reviews.title: One of My "Go To" Ropes
customer_reviews.text: Use this the MOST out of a Dozen Others I have
customer_reviews.author: D. Seeman

customer_reviews.title: Good Dock Line
customer_reviews.text: I like this. I've used several brands before and this is my favorite. I recommend you buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Like the tie ropes, love the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice long tie lines, great price, work great. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 inch line really sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Probably could have used the smaller size line. 1/2" a little too big for cleats on 26ft party barge
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Good rope, nice color
customer_reviews.text: Good quality rope, nice length. Have not had the house boat out on the water yet, but I think this time will be fine

customer_reviews.title: Quality braided lines for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality dock lines for the price. Have been happy with them

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: Quality and quick shipping made for a great transaction! Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Jrush

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Snapped!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a number of dock lines over the years to hold my 21 foot fiberglass boat to the side of a fresh-water dock. This line snapped on me after 2 months of use, which has never happen to me.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent line!
customer_reviews.text: This rope is tightly braided, nicely finished, thick, sturdy, smooth with just a little surface grab and worth every penny. Well done!

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with dock lines, as expected with properly finished ends. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy to tie knots
customer_reviews.text: Soft and easy to work with. Very nice feel. Went thru a lot of dock lines and so far these have been my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: echo

customer_reviews.title: Great line, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality line, nice feel and half the price of the local shop. Bought 4 so they all match now. Retired the old ones as spares.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain2sea

customer_reviews.title: It's a blue rope
customer_reviews.text: It's a rope. It's blue. It ties up my boat. like it
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the quality of the lines, I will follow up on how they hold up after time of them being on the boat

customer_reviews.title: Dock Line
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we needed for the boat. Nicely made and glad there is a loop on the end.
customer_reviews.author: DRL

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality lines
customer_reviews.text: These lines are exactly as advertised. They look great, work great and are packaged nice. The picture was taken after using several times to get a feel for the quality before review. I would recommend and will order more of these lines.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very good manufacturing. The free end is cleanly cut with a "hot" cutter and has good whipping below that. The eye is also very well spliced (far better than probably needed). The line quality seems excellent. I will be buying more of this brand from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN OROURKE

customer_reviews.title: 20' on the box but measure 15'??????
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these lines for docking our PWCs. Both 3/8 by 20'. The boxes were labeled correctly but the lines were just shy of 15 feet long.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect docking ropes.
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these for our 24’ cabin cruiser. Liked them so well we bought 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pernicano

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice on the front of my center console. Was the perfect length for my 18 ft center console.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great line to tie to the dock with, highly recommend

customer_reviews.title: Solid double braid. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Great double braided rope. Very strong and smooth to handle. What more to say.

customer_reviews.text: This is a great rope. I haven’t lost my boat since buying.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice rope
customer_reviews.text: Really nice rope, perfect for my Sea Ray 250. I like the way the blue color stands out at the dock.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and durability
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and the color matches my SeaRay interior. I like the braided loops for easy use and the price point is very competitive

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.  The color of blue is very light, as the Amazon photo shows.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. The color of blue is very light, as the Amazon photo shows.

customer_reviews.title: They look and feel good. The "neck" for the looped end is stiff ...
customer_reviews.text: Just started using them so I can't speak to durability yet. They look and feel good. The "neck" for the looped end is stiff and can't be knotted, etc., compared to some purchased at Overtons.
customer_reviews.author: T. H. Frazer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: Our dock lines were in pretty bad shape after several seasons of use so we decided to replace them. We had been using 3/8" 3-strand nylon and decided to do with the double-braided nylon. The price was good and these are nice dock lines.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality boat rope
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels like great quality rope. good price and time will tell how it lasts. I will update my review if doesn't perform well over time.
customer_reviews.author: RobbyB

customer_reviews.title: Essential equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Get the longest item available (20 ft). Good to have the extra length to throw.
customer_reviews.author: DavidB

customer_reviews.title: Cheap braiding.
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe how fast the outer braiding failed. Hadn't even attached it to the boat an the inner white nylon material was bulging through the outer blue braiding in 3 places. Look elsewhere.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Strong
customer_reviews.text: Soft and strong, it's always nice to have new dock lines and these are good quality and a good price. Living in the tropics, I like to replace them once a year when they get stiff from too much UV..

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: For my purpose it is exactly what I needed and expected.

customer_reviews.title: Rip-roarin' rope
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rope. I wish I had ordered one size down, but this will do the trick. Strong, and the ends are finished nicely.

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Marine Double Braided Dock Line
customer_reviews.text: This Shoreline Double Braided Dock Line looks to be as good as any other dock line that I have bought. Of course time will tell about how this dock line will hold up to abrasion and the wet weather.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, I ordered two. For the price I couldn't pass it up. Items came rather quickly, nice packaging. Can't wait to order two more.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this mooring line! It's soft, doesn't twist up when used, and is just the right length.

customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality. Boat lines are a perfect length for my Parker 2520 SL. I should have replaced my old lines sooner.

customer_reviews.title: Shoreline Marine Double Braided Nylon Dock...

customer_reviews.title: better than most
customer_reviews.text: I have two attwood branded dock lines, but these are nicer. The rope is more supple and is higher quality. Shordline Marine seems to have higher quality stuff than others. So i'll look for their items going forward.

customer_reviews.title: Thick and double braided
customer_reviews.text: High quality, thick weave, soft feel, strong woven loop on one end, very high strength, very nice price, I recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I had the 15" line and needed the longer one and wanted the exact same brand line.

customer_reviews.text: Coils easily, nice and strong for my 23 foot boat.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for what I use it to ty down the boat to the dock

customer_reviews.title: I'm on a boat!
customer_reviews.text: I have an old boat that gets out of hand, so I punish it by tying to the dock with these babies. They hold nice and tight and are easy on the hands!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice dock line.
customer_reviews.text: This dock line is sturdy, flexible and just plain pretty. Doesn't show the dirt like most of them do. Will buy more as we need it.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. Works great on my boat
customer_reviews.text: As expected and more. Very good quality. Works great on my boat.

customer_reviews.title: Great line
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, will be using as a dock line for my PWC. Cant wait til it gets warm to get the Seadoo back out :)

customer_reviews.title: at a great
customer_reviews.text: Same quality product as a marine store, at a great price

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rope
customer_reviews.text: Strong and reliable--used it for an outdoor rope swing and have had no problems. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kent

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, well designed, truth in advertising. I just installed the lines on my boat in October 2016, so time will tell, but it's a winner out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Craig

customer_reviews.title: worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I have used on my two banjos...one a Nechville which has an innovative hjead tightening mechanism. The other a Goodtime with the traditional hooks and nuts. It worked great on both
customer_reviews.author: PCM

customer_reviews.title: Well made - smooth lines
customer_reviews.text: Great dock lines. I have the 25 foot 1/2 inch tan/white ones. They are well made; have a quality splice; and the raw end is well bound. They are smooth and don't snag easily on my spintery dock. I only wish I could have found these in 5/8 or 3/4"
customer_reviews.author: Just a guy

customer_reviews.title: Great line
customer_reviews.text: Before buying this line my boat would just float away. Now I can keep it near the dock.

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise its a nice rope. Does what a rope should do
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it 5 stars if it would have been looped on both ends. Otherwise its a nice rope. Does what a rope should do.

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Received on time and product is as advertised. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: colegar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great lines used to tie up my 24' Regal in the Florida Keys
customer_reviews.author: Chopper Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality rope for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality rope for a good price. I bought eight ropes to hang large fenders on my house boat. The brown and white rope matches my houseboat's colors and the ropes excellent quality. The is a eye loop on one end and the other end is straight. I cannot tell the difference between this rope and other ropes I have that were twice as much money.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin6

customer_reviews.title: Versitile Line Ties Up or Down!
customer_reviews.text: Soft, supple rope that will not chafe her bewbies, wrists, thighs or ankles. This pretty and playful product actually comes with the word "kink" right on the label! Now all we need are a couple of 3/8" by ten meter lines with loops on both ends for body wraps.
customer_reviews.author: Peaceful & Easy

customer_reviews.title: Flexible but not quite 25'
customer_reviews.text: Mine was actually 23' 6" end to end (including the looped splice) instead of 25'.
customer_reviews.author: Gizmoman

customer_reviews.title: Looks like good quality stuff
customer_reviews.text: Looks like good quality stuff. One end has a nice eye braided into it and the other end is heat sealed and whipped. Would have given it 5 stars but it comes in that plastic packaging that rips you to shreds if you are not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rope
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this rope. The eye loop is exquisitely crafted, and the other end features a perfect thermal seal. The rope itself appears to be extremely sturdy material, and the braiding is flawless.
customer_reviews.author: S. Parler

customer_reviews.title: Best deal on quality lines.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, well made docklines for the best price and quick shipping with Amazon Prime. Purchased longer than needed, cut off extra length and whipped ends to make matching fender lines. Looks great at a bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: timothy b reilly

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Dock Lines
customer_reviews.text: Have had these on the Boat All Summer and they have not faded at all - Do not appear to be fraying either on the Galvanized Cleats - would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Waterdog

product_meta.title: Shoreline Marine Double Braided Nylon Dock Line
feature_bullets: Shoreline dock lines are available in a wide range of sizes and colors to fit your specific dock/boat combination
Double Braided Nylon does not kink or rotate under heavy loads while also maintaining a smooth feel that won’t grind on your boat’s finish
Constructed with a solid loop on one end and a straight end on the other to allow you to customize your dock configuration with the thick marine rope dock line and boat rope
These lines can also be easily used in conjunction with any brand of boat fender or bumper
Nylon is extremely durable and offers a measure of stretch that will help secure boats during unexpected high wave events when you need the toughest of mooring lines for boats
